track.name: War
comments: war? wait til we are out of resources
Give praise to H.I.M. Haile Selassie I. KIng of Kings, Lord of Lords, Counquering Lion of the Tribe of Judah.
This is the definition of Marleyism!!!!!
The Blueprint for True life! One world, One People!
The lyrics are derived from a speech made by Haile Selassie I before the United Nations General Assembly in 1963.
Incredible, if you get time, just read the lyrics.  This was written in the 70s man, and how so very relevant it remains.
Until.Up To the point in time or the event/s mentioned.....Until then.

Victory...of good over evil.......but when ? ....soon I hope.....
so true.............it's all about ...love & unity I believe...........
why is it so difficult for so many people ?.......I don't get it...forgive me......
Without regard, we all live under the same sun!
WAR!!  now....more than ever!  Yes Bob!!
This is definitely one of Bob's best songs !! Listen to the live version, it's amazing !! Enjoy :-)
Some awesome and sublime truth spoken here by the Prophet Marley! Amen brother, you speak the truth about one hell of a ugly issue. This is one fantastic track.

Spoke from the mouth of H.I.M. Haile Selassie the conquering Lion.
told again by the great  Bob!. .....................Peace...................the Doc

and its still going on till this day WAR
